name: Marshal
description:
A game where you recruit brave young (and old) men to fight on the front-lines in defense of their nation.
As the marshal, you will find yourself convincing citizens to join the war effort, training them into tolerable fighters, and commanding them on the battlefields of war.

Although all the planned game-play mechanics are currently implemented, there are a few features that still need to be implemented, foremost of these is sound effects.
Also, there are some controls that aren't mentioned in game, since there isn't really a place for them to go.
-R restarts the game, from any position.
-Spacebar resets the game on the final screen.

Feel free to provide feedback in the comments, any suggestions for improvement are welcome.
